name: The Office: Somehow We Manage
summary: The Office: Somehow We Manage lets fans play through hilarious moments from the critically-acclaimed Emmy award winning comedy, where they'll tap their way to record proﬁts at Dunder Mifflin, and get down to business with Michael Scott, Jim Halpert, Pam Beesly, Kelly Kapoor, Dwight Schrute, Stanley Hudson and others.
